languages.text: {n}Паскаль тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Он страдает. Срок службы данной единицы давно исчерпан, но Истинная плоть, которой она наделена за заслуги перед флотом, столь древняя и священная, что умножает отмерянное ей время".

{n}Pasqal sighs heavily.{/n} "He is suffering. This unit is long past its operational life expectancy, but the particularly ancient and sacred True Flesh it was awarded for its outstanding service to the fleet is still prolonging its years."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Он страдает. Срок службы данной единицы давно исчерпан, но Истинная плоть, которой она наделена за заслуги перед флотом, столь древняя и священная, что умножает отмерянное ей время".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sighs heavily.{/n} "He is suffering. This unit is long past its operational life expectancy, but the particularly ancient and sacred True Flesh which it was awarded for its outstanding service to the Fleet is still prolonging its years."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは大きなため息をつく。{/n}「彼は苦しんでいます。このユニットはとっくに稼働寿命が切れているのです。しかし、艦隊へのめざましい貢献に対して与えられた大昔の聖なる真の肉体が、その稼働寿命を今も延長させています」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sighs heavily.{/n} "He is suffering. This unit is long past its operational life expectancy, but the particularly ancient and sacred True Flesh it was awarded for its outstanding service to the fleet is still prolonging its years."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは大きなため息をつく。{/n}「彼は苦しんでいます。このユニットはとっくに稼働寿命が切れているのです。しかし、艦隊へのめざましい貢献に対して与えられた大昔の聖なる真の肉体が、その稼働寿命を今も延長させています」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“他很痛苦。这个单位早已超出了它的预期使用寿命。由于它对舰队做出了杰出的贡献，它获得了古老而神圣的实肉，这些实肉仍然在延长它的寿命。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sighs heavily.{/n} "He is suffering. This unit is long past its operational life expectancy, but the particularly ancient and sacred True Flesh it was awarded for its outstanding service to the fleet is still prolonging its years."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“他很痛苦。这个单位早已超出了它的预期使用寿命。由于它对舰队做出了杰出的贡献，它获得了古老而神圣的实肉，这些实肉仍然在延长它的寿命。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Il souffre. Cette unité a depuis longtemps dépassé son espérance de vie opérationnelle. S'il est encore vivant, c'est uniquement grâce à la chair véritable qui lui a été accordée en remerciement de ses services. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sighs heavily.{/n} "He is suffering. This unit is long past its operational life expectancy, but the particularly ancient and sacred True Flesh it was awarded for its outstanding service to the fleet is still prolonging its years."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Il souffre. Cette unité a depuis longtemps dépassé son espérance de vie opérationnelle. S'il est encore vivant, c'est uniquement grâce à la chair véritable qui lui a été accordée en remerciement de ses services. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal suspira profundamente.{/n} «Está sufriendo. Esta unidad ya hace tiempo que ha superado su esperanza de vida operativa, pero la antigua y sagrada verdadera carne que se le otorgó por su excepcional servicio a la flota sigue prolongando sus años de existencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sighs heavily.{/n} "He is suffering. This unit is long past its operational life expectancy, but the particularly ancient and sacred True Flesh it was awarded for its outstanding service to the fleet is still prolonging its years."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal suspira profundamente.{/n} «Está sufriendo. Esta unidad ya hace tiempo que ha superado su esperanza de vida operativa, pero la antigua y sagrada verdadera carne que se le otorgó por su excepcional servicio a la flota sigue prolongando sus años de existencia».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal seufzt schwer.{/n} "Er leidet. Diese Einheit hat ihre operative Lebenserwartung längst hinter sich. Doch das besonders alte und heilige Wahre Fleisch, das sie für ihre herausragenden Dienste an der Flotte erhalten hat, verlängert ihre Lebensdauer noch immer."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sighs heavily.{/n} "He is suffering. This unit is long past its operational life expectancy, but the particularly ancient and sacred True Flesh it was awarded for its outstanding service to the fleet is still prolonging its years."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal seufzt schwer.{/n} "Er leidet. Diese Einheit hat ihre operative Lebenserwartung längst hinter sich. Doch das besonders alte und heilige Wahre Fleisch, das sie für ihre herausragenden Dienste an der Flotte erhalten hat, verlängert ihre Lebensdauer noch immer."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Acı içinde. Bu birim, beklenen faaliyet ömrünü epey bir aşmış. Filo adına gerçekleştirdiği olağanüstü hizmetler nedeniyle bahşedilen oldukça kadim ve kutsal Salt Suret, ömrünü hâlâ uzatmakta."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sighs heavily.{/n} "He is suffering. This unit is long past its operational life expectancy, but the particularly ancient and sacred True Flesh it was awarded for its outstanding service to the fleet is still prolonging its years."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Acı içinde. Bu birim beklenen operasyonel yaşam sürecinin çok ötesine geçmiş ancak filo adına gerçekleştirdiği olağanüstü hizmetler nedeniyle ona bahşedilen oldukça kadim ve kutsal Salt Suret, yıllarını hâlâ uzatmakta."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
